logs.update_available: Доступна новая версия приложения, хотите перезагрузиться для обновления? Убедитесь, что вы закрыли/обновили другие вкладки приложения
logs.error_downloading_audio: Не получилось скачать аудиофайл, может мелодия слишком длинная?
logs.error_importing_invalid_format: Ошибка при импорте файла, недопустимый формат
logs.converting_recorded_to_composed_warning: Создание готовой мелодии из записанной, аудио может быть неточным
logs.suggest_backup: Вы давно не делали резервной копии своих мелодий, не забывайте иногда их загружать!
logs.storage_persisted_error: Возникла ошибка при настройке постоянного хранилища

question.unsaved_song_save: Вы не сохранили изменения мелодии: "{{song_name}}", хотите сохранить? НЕСОХРАНЁННЫЕ ИЗМЕНЕНИЯ БУДУТ УТЕРЯНЫ
question.ask_song_name_cancellable: Введите имя мелодии, нажмите "Отмена" чтобы проигнорировать

confirm.delete_song: Вы уверены, что хотите удалить мелодию "{{song_name}}"?
confirm.confirm_import_opened_file: Вы открыли файлы "{{files_names}}", хотите их импортировать?

home.app_description: Приложение, в котором можно создавать, разучивать и играть мелодии для {{APP_NAME}}
home.add_to_home_screen: Чтобы открыть это веб-приложение на весь экран, добавьте сайт на рабочий стол
home.clear_cache_warning: Очистка кэша браузера / хранилища может привести к удалению мелодий, не забывайте делать резервные копии
home.persistent_storage_button: Нажмите на кнопку внизу чтобы убедиться, что ваши мелодии не будут удалены браузером, когда у вас будет заканчиваться память
home.privacy_policy: Мы используем файлы cookie для аналитики. Продолжая использование приложения, вы соглашаетесь с использованием файлов cookie. Подробнее:
home.no_affiliation: Это приложение не связано с {{company_name}}, оно было сделано фанатами.
home.composer_description: Создавайте или редактируйте мелодии с полноценным секвенсором. Также с MIDI
home.player_description: Играйте, скачивайте, записывайте и импортируйте мелодии. Разучите мелодию в реальном времени или в режиме тренировки.
home.cache_reload_warning: Вы уверены, что хотите очистить кэш? Страница будет перезагружена
home.rights: © Все права защищены {{company_name}}. Другие права принадлежат соответствующим владельцам.
home.about_to_leave_warning: Вы выйдете из приложения и перейдёте на "{{to}}", хотите продолжить?
home.rotate_screen: Для удобного использования добавьте веб-сайт на рабочий стол и переверните устройство

menu.midi_download_warning: Используя MIDI, вы теряете точность мелодии, если планируете ей поделиться с другими, желательно выбрать другой формат (кнопка выше). Всё ещё хотите скачать?
menu.confirm_delete_folder:
Уверены, что хотите удалить папку "{{folder_name}}"?  
            Мелодии останутся невредимыми

settings.memory_persisted_description:
Your data is persisted in the browser, the browser should not automatically clear it.
                            Always make sure to download a backup sometimes, especially when you will not use the app
                            for a long time
settings.memory_not_persisted_description:
The browser didn't allow to store data persistently, it might happen that you will loose
                            data
                            when cache is automatically cleared. To get persistent storage, add the app to the home
                            screen.
                            If that still doesn't work, make sure you do a backup often

props.composer_bpm_description: Beats per minute, the speed of the song. Usually the BPM inside the app should be 4 times the BPM of the song you are trying to compose
props.composer_base_pitch_description: The main pitch of the song
props.composer_beat_marks_description: The number of beats per measure, 3/4 is 3 beats per measure, 4/4 is 4 beats per measure
props.composer_note_name_type_description: The type of text which will be written on the note
props.composer_columns_per_canvas_description: How many columns are visible at a time, more columns might cause lag
props.composer_reverb_description: Makes it sound like you are in a cave, this is the default value applied to every instrument
props.composer_autosave_description: Autosaves the changes to a song every 5 edits and when you change page/song
props.composer_use_keyboard_side_buttons: Put next/previous column buttons around keyboard
props.composer_use_keyboard_side_buttons_descr: Puts the buttons to select the next/previous column on the left/right of the keyboard
props.composer_sync_tabs_description: Advanced feature, it syncs other browser tabs to all play at the same time
props.composer_lookahead_time_description: How many milliseconds ahead the composer will look for notes to play, a higher value improves playback accuracy by reducing stutters, but feels less responsive
props.player_instrument_description: The main (first) instrument of the player, will also be saved in the song you record
props.player_pitch_description: The pitch of the player, will also be saved in the song you record
props.player_bpm_description: Beats per minute, used by the metronome and will be used when converting the song with the composer
props.player_sync_song_data: Auto sync the song's instruments and pitch
props.player_sync_song_data_description: Whenever you load a song, the instruments and pitch of that song will be loaded too
props.player_metronome_beats_description: After how many times a stronger beat is played
props.player_reverb_description: Makes it sound like you are in a cave
props.player_note_name_type_description: The type of text which will be written on the note
props.player_keyboard_y_position_description: The vertical position of the keyboard
props.player_approach_speed_description: The time between when the notes appear and when they reach the end (in ms)
props.player_note_animation_description: Toggle the animation of the notes (will reduce performance)
props.player_show_visual_sheet_description: Show the sheet above the keyboard (might reduce performance)
props.vsrg_composer_keys_description: How many keys the song has, reducing this value will delete the notes in the extra keys
props.vsrg_composer_bpm_description: Beats per minute, the speed of the song
props.vsrg_composer_pitch_description: The main pitch of the song
props.vsrg_composer_is_vertical_description: If the editor is set horizontally or vertically
props.vsrg_composer_max_fps_description: The FPS limiter of the editor, higher values could cause audio stutters
props.vsrg_scroll_snap: Snap the scroll to snap point
props.vsrg_scroll_snap_description: When scrolling, snap the timestamp to the closest snap point
props.vsrg_composer_autosave_description: Autosaves the changes to a song every 5 edits and when you change page/song
props.vsrg_composer_difficulty_description: Higher values means the notes need to be pressed more accurately
props.vsrg_player_approach_time_description: The time between when the notes appear and when they reach the end (in ms)
props.vsrg_player_max_fps_description: The FPS limiter of the player, too high values could cause stutters
props.vsrg_player_keyboard_layout_description: The keyboard layout of the player
props.vsrg_player_offset_description: An offset to the audio if it plays too early/late (in ms)
props.vsrg_player_vertical_offset_description: The Vertical offset for the line layout
props.vsrg_player_horizontal_offset_descriptio: The Horizontal offset for the line layout
props.zen_instrument_description: The main instrument of the keyboard
props.zen_metronome_beats_description: After how many times a stronger beat is played
props.zen_reverb_description: Makes it sound like you are in a cave
props.zen_note_name_type_description: The type of text which will be written on the note
props.zen_keyboard_y_position_description: The vertical position of the keyboard

vsrg_composer.delete_track_question: Are you sure you want to remove this track? All notes will be deleted.
vsrg_composer.background_song_info: You can select one of your songs to be played on the background

transfer.error_connecting: Error connecting, please visit the domain, there might be changelog.
transfer.import_data_from_other_domains_descripti:
Here you can import data from other existing domains of the app, select the domain you want to import
                from and click import.
                You will be shown all the data from the other domain, and you can select to import it all at once or
                only what you need.
transfer.select_a_website_to_import_data: Select a website to import data from

theme.error_importing_theme: There was an error importing this theme, is it the correct file?
theme.choose_theme_name: How do you want to name the theme?
theme.confirm_delete_theme: Are you sure you want to delete the theme "{{theme_name}}"?
theme.opaque_performance_warning: GIF backgrounds and opaque (transparent) colors could reduce performance

sheet_visualizer.sheet_visualizer_instructions:
Select a song from the menu on the left.
                    Remember that you can learn a song with the interactive
                    practice tool in the Player
sheet_visualizer.invalid_song_to_visualize: Invalid song, it is not composed or recorded
sheet_visualizer.error_converting_to_visual_song_try_conv: Error converting song to visual song, trying to convert to recorded song first...
sheet_visualizer.error_converting_to_visual_song: Error converting song to visual song

player.approach_mode_description: Play in Approach mode the song "{{song_name}}"
player.song_search_description: Here you can find songs to learn, they are provided by the sky-music library.
player.midi_or_audio_import_redirect_warning: You cannot directly import this file format. MIDI, Video and Audio files need to be converted in the composer, do you want to open it?

keybinds.already_used_keybind: This keybind is already used by the note "{{note_name}}"
keybinds.keyboard_keybinds_description:
You can remap the keyboard keys to whatever key on your keyboard, press the note you want to remap
                    then press the key you want to assign to it.
keybinds.midi_note_selection_description:
Click on the note to select it, then press your MIDI keyboard to assign that note to the key. You
                    can click it again to change it.
keybinds.confirm_delete_preset: Are you sure you want to delete the preset "{{preset_name}}"?
keybinds.already_existing_preset: Preset with this name already exists
keybinds.ask_preset_name: Write the name of the preset
keybinds.cannot_edit_builtin_preset: Cannot edit built-in preset, create a new one to edit it
keybinds.midi_access_denied: MIDI access was denied, please allow it in the browser settings and reload the page
keybinds.midi_access_unsupported: MIDI is not supported in this browser

error.confirm_delete_all_songs: Are you sure you want to delete ALL SONGS?
error.error_page_description:
If you unexpectedly see this page it means an error has occoured.
            Here you can download or delete your songs, if one caused an error, delete it.
            If you need help, join our discord server and send the log file below.

donate.donate_message:
Each App I make takes months of learning and development. Added to that
            are also the costs of hosting. With a higher budget I can afford to not
            worry so much about how much I spend on the server, giving you the best
            possible experience.
            
            I care about giving users all features without
            having to pay for it, neither having intrusive ads which can be annoying.
            For this same reason, there is no source of income except donations.


            I would be really thankful if you could consider donating in order to fund
            development and costs.

cache.reset_cache_message:
This page will clear the cache of the application. This will remove all cached data and reload the page.
                It will not
                delete your songs or data, only the cached assets. As soon as you visit this page, it will clear the
                cache automatically.
                You can also click the button below to clear the cache manually.

page404.page_not_found: The page was not found, click here to go back to the home page

backup.confirm_after_songs_validation_error: There were errors validating some songs. Do you want to continue downloading?
backup.confirm_after_folders_validation_error: There were errors validating some folders. Do you want to continue downloading?
backup.confirm_after_themes_validation_error: There were errors validating some themes. Do you want to continue downloading?
backup.confirm_delete_songs_step_1: Write 'delete' if you want to delete all songs, press cancel to ignore
backup.confirm_delete_songs_step_2: Are you REALLY sure you want to delete all songs?
backup.confirm_delete_themes_step_1: Write 'delete' if you want to delete all themes, press cancel to ignore
backup.confirm_delete_themes_step_2: Are you REALLY sure you want to delete all themes?
backup.transfer_data_notice: If you want to transfer your data from another domain of the app, click here
backup.backup_advice:
Make sure you create a backup every now and then. Especially if you just finished a new song.
            The browser shouldn't delete your data, especially if you installed the app, but there is always a chance.
backup.backup_download_tooltip: Download all the data of the app, aka themes, songs, folders
backup.download_all_backup_tooltip: Downloads a backup containing all songs and folders
backup.download_songs_tooltip: Downloads a backup containing all songs and folders
backup.download_themes_tooltip: Downloads a backup of all the custom themes
backup.no_themes_to_backup: There are no themes to backup
backup.import_backup_description:
If you have a backup, you can import it here, they will be added to your existing data. (if you already have
            the same song,
            a duplicate will be created).
backup.error_reading_file: There was an error reading the file
backup.import_backup_tooltip: Here you can import any backup you have
backup.delete_data_description:
If you want, you can also delete all your data here, once deleted it can't be recovered.
            Don't worry you will be asked to confirm before anything is deleted.
backup.delete_songs_and_folders_tooltip: Here you can delete all your themes
backup.delete_themes_tooltip: Here you can delete all your themes

composer.confirm_layer_remove: Are you sure you want to remove "{{layer_name}}"? ALL NOTES OF THIS LAYER WILL BE DELETED
composer.cant_add_more_than_n_layers: You can't add more than {{max_layers}} layers!
composer.ask_song_name_for_composed_song_version: Write the song name for the composed version, press cancel to ignore
composer.error_with_this_layer: There was an error with this layer

tools.all_layers_description: Select all the layers in the highlighted columns
tools.select_layer_description: Select all the notes in the highlighted columns or only the ones of the current layer

midi_parser.global_note_offset_description:
The index of each note will be pushed up/down by this amount, you can use it to make
                            the song fit into the app range. You can also change the offset of each layer.
midi_parser.local_note_offset_description: Changes the index of each note by this amount.
midi_parser.max_octave_scaling_description: Scale down/up the notes which are out of scale by theose octaves.
midi_parser.error_is_file_midi: There was an error importing this file, is it a .mid file?
midi_parser.converting_audio_to_midi: Converting audio to midi (might take a while)..
midi_parser.audio_conversion_warning:
🔬 This feature is experimental, it might not work or get stuck. 
Audio and video conversion is less accurate than MIDI, if you can, it's better to use MIDI or compose manually. 
Use audio and videos that have only one instrument playing.

composer.warning_opening_midi_importer: Opening the midi importer to import a MIDI file, please reselect the file
composer.warning_opening_audio_importer: Opening the midi importer to import a video/audio file... Please reselect the file. video/audio conversion is not very accurate
composer.error_importing_file_invalid_format_audi: Error importing file, invalid format, if it's a MIDI,Video or audio file, use the "Create from MIDI" button
composer.ask_download_of_current_song: You are currently editing this song ("{{song_name}}"), do you want to save it before downloading?

instrument_settings.volume_high_warning: If you hear distortion, reduce the volume

composer.li_1: Click the song name to load it
composer.li_2: You can use different instruments and pitch for each layer
composer.li_3: Tempo changers help you make faster parts of a song without having very high bpm
composer.li_4: You can quickly create a song by importing a MIDI file and editing it, not all songs are convertable directly, you might need to edit it a bit.
composer.li_5: You can also quickly create a song from audio / video, this is an experimental feature and not very accurate
composer.li_6: You can add breakpoints to the timeline (the bar below the composer) to quickly jump between parts of a song

player.li_1: Click the song name to play it
player.li_2: You can import songs made by other users (does not accept audio files). Or you can download yours to share
player.li_3: To create your song, you can record the notes you play or create one in the composer
player.li_6: You can connect a MIDI keyboard to play

help.question_mark_description:
Hover over the buttons to see a tooltip.
            When clicking this button (?),  it will show you more info.
help.learn_how_to_use_player: Learn how to use the Player
help.learn_how_to_use_composer: Learn how to use the composer
help.learn_how_to_use_vsrg_composer: Learn how to use the Vsrg composer
help.click_to_visit_blog: Click here to visit the tutorial

props.add_column_description: Add a column after the selected column
props.set_tap_hand_description: Set the click to create a tap note
props.set_hold_hand_description: Set the click to create a hold note
props.set_delete_hand_description: Set the click to delete a note
props.vsrg_add_hit_object: Add hit object (syncs to the registered keybinds)
